AT.name: Demon's Crest™
AT.description: Nach seinem Weg vom einfachen Gegner in der Ghosts'n`Goblins-Reihe bis zu seinem eigenen Spiel Gargoyle's Quest muss der Dämon Firebrand nun darum kämpfen, den Frieden im Königreich der Dämonen wiederherzustellen. Firebrand muss die sechs Steine des mächtigen Dämonenwappens in seinen Besitz bringen, bevor sie seinem Widersacher Phalanx in die Klauen fallen. Firebrand kann nicht nur fliegen und Feuer spucken, sondern er kann ann außerdem sechs einzigartige Gestalten annehmen, deren besondere Fähigkeiten bei seiner Suche unschätzbar wertvoll sein werden. Drei unterschiedliche Endsequenzen harren ihrer Entdeckung. Kannst du die Königreiche vor der totalen Anarchie bewahren? Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

HU.name: Demon's Crest™
HU.description: From a lowly enemy in the Ghosts ‘n Goblins series, to spin-off Gargoyle’s Quest, Firebrand the demon now finds himself fighting to restore peace in the demon realm. Firebrand must recover the six stones of the powerful Demon’s Crest before they fall into the claws of his nemesis Phalanx. As well as being able to breath fire and fly, Firebrand can transform into six unique guises with special abilities that will prove invaluable to his quest. With three different endings to discover, can you save the realms from total anarchy? This is the US version of the game.

BR.name: DEMON'S CREST™
BR.description: Firebrand sai em uma jornada para recuperar as 6 pedras mágicas de Demon’s Crest antes que o domínio de humanos e demônios caia nas mãos de seu inimigo atroz, Phalanx. Cuspa fogo, agarre paredes e paire por 7 intensos níveis enquanto você luta para salvar os reinos de uma desordem eterna!

BE.name: Demon's Crest™
BE.description: D'un simple ennemi de la série Ghosts 'n Goblins au jeu dérivé Gargoyle's Quest, le démon Firebrand doit maintenant combattre pour ramener la paix dans le royaume des démons. Firebrand doit retrouver les six pierres marquées du sceau du dragon avant qu'elles ne tombent entre les mains de son ennemi juré, Phalanx. En plus de pouvoir cracher du feu et voler, Firebrand peut se transformer et prendre six formes uniques lui conférant des capacités spéciales qui s'avéreront indispensables à sa quête. Avec trois fins différentes à découvrir, parviendrez-vous à sortir le royaume de l'anarchie totale ? Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

FI.description: From a lowly enemy in the Ghosts ‘n Goblins series, to spin-off Gargoyle’s Quest, Firebrand the demon now finds himself fighting to restore peace in the demon realm. Firebrand doit retrouver les six pierres marquées du sceau du dragon avant qu'elles ne tombent entre les mains de son ennemi juré, Phalanx. Avec trois fins différentes à découvrir, parviendrez-vous à sortir le royaume de l'anarchie totale ? Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

IT.name: Demon's Crest™
IT.description: Da semplice antagonista nella serie di Ghosts ‘n Goblins a eroe predestinato di Gargoyle’s Quest, Firebrand si trova ora a dover combattere per riportare la pace nel regno dei demoni. La sua missione è recuperare i sei portentosi emblemi del drago prima che finiscano nelle mani nemiche di Phalanx. Sputa fiamme, vola e assumi una delle sei forme di Firebrand, ognuna con le proprie abilità specifiche, per portare a termine la tua impresa... La storia può finire in tre modi diversi! Riuscirai a salvare il regno dal caos? Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

ES.name: Demon's Crest™
ES.description: Firebrand pasó de ser un enemigo secundario en la saga de Ghosts ‘n Goblins a protagonizar Gargoyle’s Quest, y ahora se enfrenta a su mayor desafío: restaurar la paz en el Reino de los Demonios. Su misión consiste en recuperar las seis piedras mágicas del poderoso Escudo del Demonio antes de que caigan en las garras de Phalanx, su peor enemigo. Además de volar y escupir bocanadas de fuego, Firebrand puede adoptar seis formas con habilidades distintas que le resultarán indispensables en su viaje. ¿Serás capaz de salvar los reinos del caos absoluto? ¡Averígualo en esta aventura con tres finales diferentes! Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

BG.name: Demon's Crest™
BG.description: From a lowly enemy in the Ghosts ‘n Goblins series, to spin-off Gargoyle’s Quest, Firebrand the demon now finds himself fighting to restore peace in the demon realm. Firebrand must recover the six stones of the powerful Demon’s Crest before they fall into the claws of his nemesis Phalanx. As well as being able to breath fire and fly, Firebrand can transform into six unique guises with special abilities that will prove invaluable to his quest. With three different endings to discover, can you save the realms from total anarchy? This is the US version of the game.

CA.name: DEMON'S CREST™
CA.description: Firebrand must set off to recover the six magical stones of the Demon Crest before the realms of humans and demons fall into the hands of his evil nemesis, Phalanx. Breathe fire, claw walls and hover across seven intense levels as you fight to save the realms from eternal unrest!

MT.description: From a lowly enemy in the Ghosts ‘n Goblins series, to spin-off Gargoyle’s Quest, Firebrand the demon now finds himself fighting to restore peace in the demon realm. Firebrand must recover the six stones of the powerful Demon’s Crest before they fall into the claws of his nemesis Phalanx. As well as being able to breath fire and fly, Firebrand can transform into six unique guises with special abilities that will prove invaluable to his quest. With three different endings to discover, can you save the realms from total anarchy? This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: DEMON'S CREST™
MX.description: Firebrand deberá prepararse para recuperar las seis piedras mágicas de Demon Crest antes de que los reinos de los humanos y de los demonios caigan en las manos de su enemigo Phalanx. Escupe fuego, sujétate a los muros y flota alrededor de siete intensos niveles, ¡mientras luchas por rescatar a los reinos de la desdicha eterna!

HR.name: Demon's Crest™
HR.description: From a lowly enemy in the Ghosts ‘n Goblins series, to spin-off Gargoyle’s Quest, Firebrand the demon now finds himself fighting to restore peace in the demon realm. Firebrand must recover the six stones of the powerful Demon’s Crest before they fall into the claws of his nemesis Phalanx. As well as being able to breath fire and fly, Firebrand can transform into six unique guises with special abilities that will prove invaluable to his quest. With three different endings to discover, can you save the realms from total anarchy? This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Demon's Crest™
NL.description: Na een bescheiden rol als vijand te hebben gespeeld in de Ghosts ’n Goblins-serie, en na zijn avontuur in de spin-off Gargoyle's Quest, moet Firebrand nu vechten om de vrede te herstellen in het rijk der demonen. Firebrand moet de zes stenen van de Demon's Crest heroveren voor ze in de klauwen vallen van zijn aartsvijand Phalanx. Firebrand kan niet alleen vliegen en vuur spuwen, maar ook zes unieke vormen met speciale vaardigheden aannemen die van onschatbare waarde zijn tijdens het avontuur. Het verhaal bevat drie alternatieve eindes. Kun jij het spel uitspelen en het rijk redden van de totale chaos? Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

RU.name: Demon's Crest™
RU.description: Некогда демон Firebrand был всего лишь одним из второстепенных персонажей серии Ghosts ‘n Goblins, затем стал главным героем в созданной по ее мотивам игре Gargoyle’s Quest, ну а теперь ему предстоит спасти от хаоса целый демонический мир! Для этого Firebrand должен завладеть шестью магическими камнями Demon’s Crest, пока они не достались его заклятому врагу — хитроумному демону по имени Phalanx. Firebrand обладает огненным дыханием, может летать и принимать шесть различных обличий c особыми навыками, которые пригодятся вам при прохождении уровней. Сюжет игры предполагает три разных концовки — к какой из них придете вы? Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SK.name: Demon's Crest™
SK.description: From a lowly enemy in the Ghosts ‘n Goblins series, to spin-off Gargoyle’s Quest, Firebrand the demon now finds himself fighting to restore peace in the demon realm. Firebrand must recover the six stones of the powerful Demon’s Crest before they fall into the claws of his nemesis Phalanx. As well as being able to breath fire and fly, Firebrand can transform into six unique guises with special abilities that will prove invaluable to his quest. With three different endings to discover, can you save the realms from total anarchy? This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Demon's Crest™
PT.description: De inimigo menor na série Ghosts ‘n Goblins a protagonista em Gargoyle’s Quest, o demónio Firebrand encontra-se agora em luta para restabelecer a paz no reino dos demónios. Firebrand terá de recuperar as seis pedras do poderoso Demon’s Crest antes que elas caiam nas garras da sua némesis, Phalanx. Para além de voar e cuspir fogo, Firebrand pode assumir seis aparências distintas com habilidades especiais, que serão indispensáveis para a sua missão. Com três finais diferentes para descobrires, conseguirás salvar o reino da anarquia total? Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RO.name: Demon's Crest™
RO.description: From a lowly enemy in the Ghosts ‘n Goblins series, to spin-off Gargoyle’s Quest, Firebrand the demon now finds himself fighting to restore peace in the demon realm.
